name: PDC World Championship Darts 2008
overview: Completely rewritten by award winning studio Rebellion PDC World Championship Darts 2009 is the best darts game to date. Featuring an all new Wii Remote control system that is more accurate and easier to play, which has been developed with the help of 14 times PDC world champion Phil "The Power" Taylor, throwing a dart is now more intuitive than ever before delivering the complete darts experience for gamers of all ages and skills. PDC Darts 2009 has 18 top pro's featured in the game, new walk ins, licensed darts music, all new venues, brand new commentary, player editor, new control systems with multiple assist modes, new career modes, female darts players and much much more. Pro darts players included in the game :- Phil Taylor, Mark Dudbridge, Raymond van Barneveld, Roland Scholten, Peter Manley, Ronnie Baxter, Wayne Mardle, Terry Jenkins, Dennis Priestley, Kevin Painter, Adrian Lewis, Andy Hamilton, Alan Warriner-Little, Andy Jenkins, John Part, James Wade, Colin Lloyd and Alan Tabern
